text: Vony prosyatʹ vas pro phases misyatsya! Skazhitʹ, "Vony zabezpechuyutʹ timing prylad dlya lyudey, ta vyznachayutʹ chas Hajj." Tse ye ne spravedlyve pobyty navkolo kushcha; righteousness dosyahayetʹsya upholding zapovidi ta buty vidvertym. Vy budete zauvazhyty BOHA, shcho vy mozhete maty uspikh
